alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 29 at 7:42AM MST until January 30 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero. * WHERE...El Paso, Pueblo, Crowley and Otero counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 7 PM Sunday to 11 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
